name: Jetpack Hero (itch)
description:
1. An action game with platform elements.
    1. Player has an permanent Jetpack. Learn how it works;
    2. The goal is to exit each level;
    3. Player has a gun and drop bombs;
    4. Some parts of environment are destroyable;
  2. The game was designed to be played with a joystick, but keyboard controls are implemented.
  3. Tiles and visual assets made by me and freely inspired on the work of VEXED (https://v3x3d.itch.io/).
  4. Font: Silver (https://poppyworks.itch.io/silver).
  5. All the sounds (except one) made by me and can be downloaded on 'gangorra games' page on itch.io:
    1. Power up sound by https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/click/
  6. Instructions on how to play are also in the game menu.
